1.0.name: wordpress/fueldeck-performance-analytics
1.0.description:
WARNING: This plugin requires an account at https://www.fueldeck.com to work!

FuelDeck uses Real User Monitoring(RUM) to analyze how speed impacts your business.

How fast is your website?

Find how users are experiencing your website. See performance timeline for each user.

User-centric analysis

Speed impacts ROI and growth. But how much? Find the answer for your business by measuring performance and analyzing behaviour of users including user engagement, retention, bounce rate and revenue per user.

Better metrics

FuelDeck not only provides averages but median, 90th and other percentiles as well which represent a better view of your website performance. By going beyond pageviews, you can measure true impact on your business. With 100% sampling, you'll get valuable performance
